name: rea-playspace
description: This repository helps get started with electron and holochain

scripts.install-deps: pnpm run tests-install && pnpm run web-install && pnpm run electron-install && pnpm run electron-tsc
scripts.happ-test-cargo: # bash scripts/happ-test.sh # We have no tests in that folder right now because our dna tests use the happ-test-ts below.
scripts.happ-reset: pnpm run happ-pack && pnpm run user-data-reset
scripts.happ-run: sh -c 'set -o allexport; . environments/.env; set +o allexport; . scripts/happ-run.sh'
scripts.redo: pnpm run happ-reset && pnpm run happ-run
scripts.happ-run2: sh -c 'set -o allexport; . environments/.env.dev2; set +o allexport; . scripts/happ-run.sh'
scripts.hc-pg: sh -c 'set -o allexport; . environments/.env; set +o allexport; npx @holochain-playground/cli ws://localhost:$REA_PLAYSPACE_ADMIN_WS_PORT'
scripts.user-data-reset: rm -rf user-data && rm -rf user2-data && mkdir user-data user2-data
scripts.web-zip: pnpm run web-build && cd ui/dist && zip -r ../ui.zip .
scripts.webhapp-pack: pnpm run web-zip && hc web-app pack workdir/
scripts.electron: set -o allexport; . environments/.env; set +o allexport; cd electron && pnpm run start
scripts.electron2: set -o allexport; . environments/.env.dev2; set +o allexport; cd electron && pnpm run start
scripts.kill-zombies: kill $(ps a | grep rea-playspace/electron | cut -d ' ' -f 3 | xargs)

author: Shane O'Donnell <shane.odonnell@steeltoad.io>, Jillian Ada Burrows <jill@adaburrows.com>, Connor Turland <connor@sprillow.com>
